root.message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 3-2-2, translated into en
root.data: Reflects the global indicator “3.3.2 Tuberculosis incidence per 100,000 population”. The concept and calculation method of the two indicators are the same, but the global indicators are not classified by: Region; provinces/cities directly under the Central Government that are disaggregated by gender and age (children and adults).
